1010110110111101 1100011011001000 1 -> sum: 0111010010000110, cout: 1
1101111100000100 1011111010010011 1 -> sum: 1001110110011000, cout: 1
1010100100100011 0010101000001100 1 -> sum: 1101001100110000, cout: 0
0111001111001000 0010110101000101 0 -> sum: 1010000100001101, cout: 0
